aboutUs.info: LLC 'BASCOO' is one of the leaders in technology integration, providing advanced solutions for audio, video, and conferencing systems. We specialize in creating comprehensive solutions that perfectly meet your requirements. Our team of professionals has many years of experience and knowledge in technology integration, allowing us to offer our clients innovative and effective solutions. We take pride in working with the most modern technologies and continually improving our methods to provide our clients with the best quality of service and results.
aboutUs.info2: Fast, Easy, Convenient, and most importantly, Reliable!
aboutUs.team: Our team consists of the best of the best, united by common ideas and aspirations. Our ambitions help us grow and develop together, reaching new heights. We have gathered specialists from around the world and value each team member equally, providing opportunities for growth and development alongside us.

form.fillForm: We will be happy to answer your questions, please fill out the form below.
form.name: Name
form.infoOne: Want a quick answer to your question? Visit the FAQ section on the website, where we have gathered answers to the most frequently asked questions.
form.infoTwo: If your question is about when a received package will be registered in the system, please note that processing a shipment takes 1-2 business days, and in rare cases, a bit longer. If the package has not arrived for more than 3 days, we recommend writing about this issue.
form.title: Contact Us
form.subTitle: If you have any suggestions or inquiries, feel free to reach out
form.subject: Subject

logo.info: Fast and reliable parcel delivery from Germany in less than 10 days!

aboutCompony.Summary: 90% of online stores in Germany do not deliver directly to Uzbekistan. Dost Logistic allows you to shop at German online stores and receive your purchases throughout Uzbekistan. With our innovative and revolutionary ideas and technologies, we strive to provide you with the best shopping experience, freedom, and the ability to overcome all borders. We are represented in Germany. Currently, our team consists of over 300 specialists – and that's just the beginning.

copywriting.copywriting: Dost Logistic Courier Service. All rights reserved.
copywriting.subtitle: CONNECTING TECHNOLOGIES OF THE FUTURE

login.howToCreatePersonalCabinet: How to create a personal account?

purchases.isWarehouseStates: Will there be a warehouse in a tax-free state?
purchases.tax: We are working on this and will launch a duty-free storage system soon. After that, orders will cost you less :)
purchases.OnlineOrder: How to place an online order?
purchases.takeback: How does the return service work?

firststep.answer: You create a payment order and add all the necessary items to it.

secondstep.answer: We accept the request, issue an invoice that includes delivery and our other services.

thirdstep.answer: You pay the invoice, and we purchase your order from the online store.

Service-important.Service-important: When do you need this service?
Service-important.first: When the online store only accepts German cards;
Service-important.second: When the online store requires the billing and delivery addresses to match;
Service-important.third: The online store only accepts PayPal, but you don’t have it;
Service-important.fourth: You need to buy many products at once, but don’t have the time for it;

delivery.whatIsTheDeliveryTimeAnswer: After the warehouse receives your goods — 3-10 days.

firststep.four: • Compressed and liquefied gases, lighters, pyrotechnics, crackers, etc.
firststep.thirteen: • Devices with lithium batteries (possible, but they require special procedures. We do not provide documents for obtaining an IMEI code.)

orderDays.orderDays: On which days do you ship from Germany to Uzbekistan?
orderDays.aswer: We ship parcels twice a week — on Mondays and Thursdays.

services.questionOne: I bought items from different online stores. Can you consolidate the parcels?
services.asnwerOne: Yes, we offer free consolidation. We will collect your purchases from different stores and send them as one.
services.questionTwo: How to send a parcel from Germany to Uzbekistan?
services.info: Dost Logistic always adheres to its principles and ideas. Since we opened in Uzbekistan, our main goal now is to provide Uzbeks the opportunity to shop from Germany and receive their purchases regardless of where they live. Our unique comprehensive service center uses convenient and modern terminals that allow you to receive your parcel in 10 seconds. We are located in the center of our city, and our call center is always available to solve any tasks.

stats.title: Numbers in Action!
stats.subTitle: Company LLC 'BASCOO' has recently significantly increased its number of clients thanks to modern solutions in audio and video technology. The team's years of experience and innovative approach ensure our success in the market.

header-info-one.header-info-one: Fast and reliable delivery from Germany
header-info-one.info: We deliver parcels and online purchases from Germany to Uzbekistan in just 7-10 days starting from $10.

header-info-two.header-info-two: Get a personal address in Germany right now!
header-info-two.info: Choose products from online stores in Germany. Arrange delivery to your personal address. We deliver quickly, safely, and economically across Uzbekistan.

header-info-three.info: We pack your parcels efficiently and accurately. We will consolidate, carefully pack, and send your parcels to your home.

howdoesItWork.info: Follow four simple steps to receive your purchase from Germany.

register.info: Sign up on the website to get a personal address in Germany. It takes just 1 minute.

shopOnline.info: Order products from online stores in Germany and provide the personal address during checkout.

registerPurchases.info: Register the purchase in your personal account, pay for delivery online using Visa or Mastercard.

acceptIt.info: Delivery will take 7 days from the moment of dispatch. You can track the delivery status and monitor your parcel in your account.

needHelpBuying.infoOne: Having trouble buying from an online store? Is the store not accepting your payment card? We can help!
needHelpBuying.infoTwo: Place an order for the Purchase Assistance service by providing links to the products you need. For just 10%, we will make the purchase and guarantee you receive exactly what you ordered!

reviewsFromOurCustomers.reviewsFromOurCustomers: What do our customers say about us?

delivery.info: There are no minimum fees for all express deliveries, and the delivery cost is calculated based on the actual weight of the order, excluding oversized parcels.

whyChooseUs.time-paragraph: We deliver solutions on time, optimizing your operations for maximum performance. Our streamlined processes ensure that you can focus on what matters most. With our expertise, we identify and eliminate inefficiencies, boosting your productivity.
whyChooseUs.pricing-paragraph: High-quality integration doesn’t have to break the bank. Our competitive pricing ensures value without compromise, making advanced technology accessible to all. We believe that everyone deserves access to top-tier solutions without overspending.
whyChooseUs.Safety-paragraph: We prioritize safety, adhering to industry standards for secure installations. Our commitment to safety means peace of mind for our clients and their projects. Rigorous training and regular audits ensure our teams uphold these standards consistently.
whyChooseUs.Innovation-paragraph: Our focus on innovation keeps you ahead. We implement the latest technologies to enhance your experience and ensure you stay competitive in the market. By embracing change, we empower you to leverage new opportunities for growth and success.

localDeliveryRates.localDeliveryRatesOne: Pickup from the warehouse in Tashkent

tariffsForStorage.tariffsForStorage: Rates for Warehouse and Additional Services
tariffsForStorage.registeringUnknownPerson: Registering incoming parcels from unknown senders
tariffsForStorage.checkTheProductPhoto: Checking goods against the invoice + photo

restrictions.four: Compressed and liquefied gases, lighters, fireworks, etc.
restrictions.twelve: Devices with lithium batteries (possible, but require special procedures. We do not provide documentation for obtaining an IMEI code)

projects.audioSystemsContent: Create the perfect sound landscape with our high-quality audio systems. We offer a full range of design, installation, and tuning services for audio systems in various spaces: from small offices to large conference halls. Our solutions include acoustic systems, amplifiers, microphones, and other equipment that ensure clarity and power of sound, meeting your requirements.
projects.ledScreensContent: Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant and clear images with our LED screens. We offer innovative solutions for creating high-quality visual presentations at any scale. Our LED screens (video walls) provide excellent image quality and reliable performance even in the most challenging conditions. Let us help you choose the perfect solution for your project.
projects.interactivePanelsContent: The interactive panels from OOO 'BASCOO' feature high technical parameters, flawless responsiveness, and sensitivity, supporting a wide range of functions.
projects.videoProcessorsContent: Optimize the processing and management of video content with our video processors. We offer solutions that provide high-quality scaling, combining, and real-time processing of video. Our video processors are ideal for creating multimedia presentations, managing video walls, and other complex visual systems. Trust us to create clear and high-quality video for your projects.
projects.vksSystemsContent: Make video conferencing simple and effective with our video conferencing systems. We offer comprehensive solutions for organizing video communication, including cameras, microphones, audio systems, and software. Our systems provide high image and sound quality, allowing you to conduct business meetings, training sessions, and webinars with maximum comfort and reliability.
projects.conferenceSystemsContent: Optimize the organization of meetings and conferences with our conference systems. We provide solutions for managing voting, translation, audio, and video, making your events more productive and organized. Our systems easily integrate with existing infrastructure and provide a user-friendly interface, facilitating effective interaction and communication.

banner.review: I have been working with this company for many years. From my best partners!
